thread.title: BRIEF-Hubei Jumpcan Pharmaceutical unit receives GMP certificate

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hubei Jumpcan Pharmaceutical unit receives GMP certificate

organizations.name: reuters) - hubei jumpcan pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Hubei Jumpcan Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says wholly owned pharmaceutical unit received goods manufacture practice (GMP) certificate from Shaanxi Food and Drug Administration
* Certificate issued to unitâ€™s products including troche, hard capsule and granula
* Valid period is until Dec. 27, 2022
